name: Cats
details: Independent and playful. Strong bonds with owners. Unique personalities in various breeds.

name: Dogs
details: Loyal companions. Unconditional love. Versatile and trainable with various breeds and sizes.

name: Rabbits
details: Gentle, social. Requires care, balanced diet, safe environment. Forms close bonds with owners.

name: Fish
details: Diverse species, colors, and sizes. Well-balanced aquarium crucial. Relaxing and rewarding hobby.

name: Birds
details: Intelligent, social. Vocalizations, vibrant plumage. Unique needs for a happy, healthy life.

name: Hamsters
details: Small, nocturnal. Adorable. Requires a comfortable cage with bedding. Low-maintenance companion.
